transliteration.english: jaa prabh kau nit braham sacheepat sree sanakaadhik hoo(n) jap keeno ||

verse.gurmukhi: sUr ssI sur nwrd swrd qwhI ky iDAwn ibKY mnu dIno ]
verse.unicode: ਸੂਰ ਸਸੀ ਸੁਰ ਨਾਰਦ ਸਾਰਦ ਤਾਹੀ ਕੇ ਧਿਆਨ ਬਿਖੈ ਮਨੁ ਦੀਨੋ ॥

en.bdb: He, on whom Surya, Chandra, Narada, Sharda meditate

verse.gurmukhi: Kojq hY ijh isD mhw muin ibAws prwsur Byd n cIno ]
verse.unicode: ਖੋਜਤ ਹੈ ਜਿਹ ਸਿਧ ਮਹਾ ਮੁਨਿ ਬਿਆਸ ਪਰਾਸੁਰ ਭੇਦ ਨ ਚੀਨੋ ॥

en.bdb: He, whom the adepts search in their contemplation and whose mystery is not comprehended by the great sages like Vyas and Prashar,

bdb.gurmukhi: ijs nUM is`D Aqy mhwmunI ivAws Aqy prwSr Kojdy hn, pr (aus dw) Byd nhIN pw sky hn;

transliteration.english: khojat hai jeh sidh mahaa mun biaas paraasur bhedh na cheeno ||
transliteration.hindi: खोजत है जिह सिध महा मुनि बिआस परासुर भेद न चीनो ॥

transliteration.ipa: kʰɔd͡ʒət̪ hæ d͡ʒɪh sɪt̪ə̀ məhɑ mʊn bɪəɑs pərɑsʊr ɓed̪ nə t͡ʃinɔ.
transliteration.ur: کھوجت هَے جه سدھ مها مُن بآس پراسر بھےد ن چیٍنو ۔۔

verse.gurmukhi: mwir bkI bk Aaur AGwsur Dynk ko pl mY bD kIno ]

bdb.gurmukhi: (ijs ny) pUqnw (bkI) bkwsur, AGwsur Aqy Dynk dYNq nUM pl ivc mwr id`qw sI;

verse.gurmukhi: sRI hir sqR Anyk hny iqh kaun gny kib sÎwm pRbIno ]

en.bdb: That Krishna, who had knocked down many enemies with skill and killed Kansa by catching him from his hair
